CustomField.description: Lookup to the User you'd like to assign the task to. If you leave this field blank, NPSP assigns the task based on the Engagement Plan Template's Default Assignee.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Lookup to the User you'd like to assign the task to. If you leave this field blank, NPSP assigns the task based on the Engagement Plan Template's Default Assignee.
CustomField.label: Assigned To
